message.name: ERR_ALTERNATENAME_FV_DUPLICATENAMETYPE
message.locale: A prospect person cannot have more than one "%1s" name.

message.name: ERR_ALTERNATENAME_XRV_NAME_TYPE_CHANGED
message.locale: You cannot change the type of the registered name.

message.name: ERR_ALTERNATENAME_FV_FORENAME_SHORT
message.locale: The forename must be at least 1 character long.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSON_FV_NAMETYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must supply a name type for the prospect person.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSON_XFV_FORENAME_EMPTY
message.locale: You must supply a forename for the prospect person.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSON_XFV_NAMETYPE_NAMESTATUS
message.locale: You cannot delete a registered name.

message.name: ERR_ALTERNATENAME_XRV_REGNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: This prospect person does not have a registered name. Please add a registered name before continuing.

message.name: ERR_ALTERNATENAME_XFV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: You must supply a name for the prospect person.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECTPERSON_XFV_FORENAME_OR_SURNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: You must supply both a forename and a surname.

message.name: ERR_ALTNAME_FV_FORENAME_OR_SURNAME_SHORT
message.locale: Both first name and last name must be at least 2 characters long.

message.name: ERR_ALTNAME_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New alternate name details cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_ALTNAME_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Alternate name details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_ALTNAME_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Alternate name details for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.
